articles.author: Jesse O’Neill
articles.title: New camera allows people to view the world how animals see it - New York Post
articles.description: A new video camera invented by a team of American and British scientists allows people to view the world how animals see it.
articles.content:
Photo filters will never be the same.
A new video camera invented by a team of American and British scientists allows people to view the world how animals see it.
While humans have sharper vision t… [+3086 chars]
